text: - ML6 is a leading AI ML company
with 10+ years experience in the field.
Generative AI has become quite a hot topic
in the last couple of years,

and customers know that
they need to invest in this
to remain competitive.
That's where ML6 can kind of step in

and provide some help on
what is the right use case
and what services can be used
to really add value to the company.
Bolt is a Belgian energy platform,

which provides green
electricity and natural gas.
As Bolt's company grew,

so did their need for
improved customer service.
ML6 leveraged large language models

and generative AI services
like Amazon Bedrock

to create a solution which
automatically assigns tickets
to a particular category

based on Bolt's internal
knowledge database.
Our collaboration with AWS,
it's only getting better and stronger.
For us, the generative AI competency
is really a starting point
for more competencies to come
to really reflect what we can do,
and really collaborating with AWS
on providing value for customers,

since we both have the same
philosophy to begin with
of a customer-first approach,
and having that really helps us

to drive a strategic
collaboration together
and help better address customer needs.
